Headline: #6 Jackson Park ExpressTemporary Southbound Reroute near Balbo/Wabash
ShortDescription: SB #6 Jackson Park Express buses are  rerouted via State, Harrison, Michigan, Balbo. then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Balbo/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Harrison, Michigan, Balbo. then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Balbo/Wabash.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Western
ShortDescription: #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Western, Grand, Damen, and Chicago, due to a street blockage near Chicago/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Western, Grand, Damen, and Chicago, then resume their normal route: due to a street blockage near Chicago/Western. 

Allow extra travel time.
